page.title: 11A Typical School Day
page.content: The school opens at 9.0 o'clock. We all rush through the doors as usual. Then we all go into our classroom and get out our spelling books, jotters, pens, pencils and reading books. Then we start to do the number square and the sentences from the board. After that we might go swimming to Dinnington Baths. We go on a coach. On the way there we pass some interesting things. For example we pass a wall which is eroding and the stones are all funny shapes and sizes. Another thing is that we can see the fields shining in the morning sunshine. At the swimming baths we all have to do what Mr Brain says. We usually start by doing a few lengths using our own choice of stroke. After swimming we come back and it is playtime. At playtime all the boys out of class 6 and 7 play football.
